wikipedia_page.main: Air Vice-Marshal Alison Mardell (born 23 September 1968) is a British solicitor and retired Royal Air Force (RAF) officer. From 2017 to 2019, she has served as Director of Legal Services (RAF) and head of the RAF Legal Branch.

response: *Alison Mardell, solicitor and senior Royal Air Force officer, was born here.
* Air Vice Marshal Alison Mardell (April 2017 to 29 September 2018)
* Alison Mardell (born 1968), British solicitor and senior RAF officer
